name: club-operations-pos
description: Multi-application system for managing club check-ins, room inventory, cleaning workflows, and operational metrics

scripts.start:local: pnpm kill-ports && pnpm db:reset && pnpm db:migrate:baseline && pnpm db:seed && pnpm dev
scripts.demo:seed: turbo run build --filter=@club-ops/shared --filter=@club-ops/ui && DEMO_MODE=true pnpm db:reset && DEMO_MODE=true pnpm --filter @club-ops/api db:migrate && DEMO_MODE=true pnpm --filter @club-ops/api seed && DEMO_MODE=true pnpm --filter @club-ops/api exec tsx src/db/seed-demo.ts
scripts.demo:dev:seedOnBoot: pnpm demo:seed && DEMO_MODE=true SEED_ON_STARTUP=true pnpm dev
scripts.demo:test: turbo run build --filter=@club-ops/shared --filter=@club-ops/ui && DEMO_MODE=true pnpm db:reset && DEMO_MODE=true pnpm --filter @club-ops/api db:migrate && DEMO_MODE=true pnpm --filter @club-ops/api seed && DEMO_MODE=true pnpm --filter @club-ops/api exec tsx src/db/seed-demo.ts && DEMO_MODE=true pnpm --filter @club-ops/api exec vitest run tests/demo-seed.test.ts
